{{Use dmy dates|date=November 2015}} {{Infobox football biography | name = Collin Quaner | image = | image_size = | fullname = Collin Quaner{{cite web |title=Squads for 2017/18 Premier League confirmed |url=https://www.premierleague.com/news/465277 |publisher=Premier League |date=1 September 2017 |accessdate=9 September 2017}} | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|df=yes|1991|6|18}} | birth_place = [[Düsseldorf]], Germany | height = 1.91 m | position = [[Forward (association football)|Forward]] | currentclub = [[Ipswich Town F.C.|Ipswich Town]]
(on loan from [[Huddersfield Town A.F.C.|Huddersfield Town]]) | clubnumber = 45 | youthyears1 = | youthclubs1 = [[Fortuna Düsseldorf]] | years1 = 2010 | clubs1 = [[Fortuna Düsseldorf II]] | caps1 = 1 | goals1 = 0 | years2 = 2010–2011 | clubs2 = [[Arminia Bielefeld II]] | caps2 = 8 | goals2 = 1 | years3 = 2010–2011 | clubs3 = [[Arminia Bielefeld]] | caps3 = 18 | goals3 = 1 | years4 = 2011–2014 | clubs4 = [[FC Ingolstadt 04 II]] | caps4 = 14 | goals4 = 3 | years5 = 2011–2014 | clubs5 = [[FC Ingolstadt 04]] | caps5 = 26 | goals5 = 2 | years6 = 2013 | clubs6 = → [[F.C. Hansa Rostock|Hansa Rostock]] (loan) | caps6 = 7 | goals6 = 0 | years7 = 2014–2015 | clubs7 = [[VfR Aalen]] | caps7 = 27 | goals7 = 6 | years8 = 2015–2017 | clubs8 = [[1. FC Union Berlin|Union Berlin]] | caps8 = 32 | goals8 = 10 | years9 = 2017– | clubs9 = [[Huddersfield Town A.F.C.|Huddersfield Town]] | caps9 = 42 | goals9 = 2 | years10 = 2019– | clubs10 = → [[Ipswich Town F.C.|Ipswich Town]] (loan) | caps10 = 4 | goals10 = 0 | nationalyears1 = 2010 | nationalteam1 = [[Germany national under-20 football team|Germany U20]] | nationalcaps1 = 1 | nationalgoals1 = 1 | club-update = 15:49, 12 February 2019 (UTC) }} '''Collin Quaner''' (born 18 June 1991) is a German [[Association football|footballer]] who plays for [[EFL Championship|Championship]] club [[Ipswich Town F.C.|Ipswich Town]], on loan from [[Huddersfield Town A.F.C.|Huddersfield Town]].{{cite web | url = http://www.kicker.de/news/fussball/3liga/vereine/3-liga/2011-12/vereinslos-0/64228/spieler_quaner-collin.html | title = Quaner, Collin | language = German | publisher = kicker.de | accessdate = 9 January 2012}} ==Club career== === Union Berlin === In July 2015, after Aalen were relegated to the [[3. Liga]], Quaner moved on a free transfer to 2. Bundesliga side [[1. FC Union Berlin|Union Berlin]] signing a two-year contract until 2017. === Huddersfield Town === On 20 January 2017 he completed a move to [[EFL Championship]] club [[Huddersfield Town]] for an undisclosed fee, signing a three-and-a-half year contract.{{cite web|url=https://www.fc-union-berlin.de/profis/aktuelle-meldungen/detail/1-FC-Union-Berlin-nimmt-Collin-Quaner-unter-Vertrag-18184V/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150526151610/http://www.fc-union-berlin.de/profis/aktuelle-meldungen/detail/1-FC-Union-Berlin-nimmt-Collin-Quaner-unter-Vertrag-18184V/|archive-date=26 May 2015|title= 1. FC Union Berlin nimmt Collin Quaner unter Vertrag |trans-title=1. FC Union Berlin signs Collin Quaner|language=German|date=26 May 2015|publisher=1. FC Union Berlin}} Quaner scored his first goal for the club on his debut against [[Rochdale A.F.C.|Rochdale]] in the [[FA Cup]] on 28 January 2017.{{cite news |url=https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/football/38700789|title=Rochdale 0-4 Huddersfield |publisher=[[BBC Sport]]|date=28 January 2017|accessdate=29 January 2017}} ==== Ipswich Town (loan) ==== On 8 January 2019, Quaner was loaned to [[Ipswich Town|Ipswich Town]].{{Cite news|url=https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/amp/football/46804431|title=Collin Quaner: Huddersfield forward joins Ipswich Town on loan|date=2019-01-08|work=BBC Sport|access-date=2019-01-08|language=en-GB}} ==Personal life== He grew up in [[Düsseldorf-Gerresheim]], where his parents still live.{{cite web|url=http://www.express.de/fortuna-duesseldorf/freitag-zu-gast-in-seiner-heimat-jubelt-collin-quaner-bald-wieder-fuer-fortuna-duesseldorf-,3292,30645682.html|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150509194244/http://www.express.de/fortuna-duesseldorf/freitag-zu-gast-in-seiner-heimat-jubelt-collin-quaner-bald-wieder-fuer-fortuna-duesseldorf-%2C3292%2C30645682.html/|archive-date=9 May 2015|title=Freitag zu Gast in seiner Heimat: Jubelt Collin Quaner bald wieder für Fortuna Düsseldorf?|trans-title=On Friday guest in his hometown: Celebrates Collin Quaner soon again for Fortuna Düsseldorf?|language=German|date=8 May 2015|publisher=express.de|deadurl=yes|df=dmy-all}} He is of [[Ghanaian people|Ghanaian]] ancestry.{{cite web|url=http://www.wz-newsline.de/lokales/duesseldorf/sport/fortuna-duesseldorf/collin-quaner-will-sich-in-bielefeld-aufdraengen-1.169810|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150518203153/http://www.wz-newsline.de/lokales/duesseldorf/sport/fortuna-duesseldorf/collin-quaner-will-sich-in-bielefeld-aufdraengen-1.169810|archive-date=18 May 2015|title=Collin Quaner will sich in Bielefeld aufdrängen|trans-title=Collin Quaner wants to make an impression in Bielefeld|language=German|date=22 June 2010|publisher=wz-newsline.de}} ==Career
